content: The day I opened up memory's door, I found something that I could live for. Curtains shook my eyes and light came rushing inside. Data behind my heart's encryption key - listen and you might hear a melody. Your fire sparked the passion that keeps burning: magic that helps me to believe. All the colors of the night and the way they help you hide; I'm learning what it's like to love and be alive. Oh, there will always be a tomorrow; you'll never have to be alone!
author: LazuLight
